text: thilan samarawira wisheshayi.

mahadewalaye dewa thirayen athulatha athi puja wasthun yam pramanayak ridi bandesiyaka thabagena kapumahathmayeku bathimathun sitina ‘mini badi mandapaya’ta pamina ema puja wasthun pilibanda wistharayak prakasha karayi.perahara samaye katharagama pudabimata paminena bathimathunta awashya pahasukam salasimata katharagama pradeshiya sabhawa pradeshiya lekam karyalaya nagarika sanwardhana adhikariya bhauthika salasum departhamenthuwa, saukhya waidya niladhari karyalaya ha katharagama polisiya katayuthu sanwidhanaya kara atha.
